featured.text: In his resignation speech, he blamed his failings on the fact that he was blood type B. The blood-type craze, considered simply harmless fun by some Japanese, may manifest itself as prejudice and discrimination.

definition.zh_def: 對某人或某事的偏見或歧視，通常基於不充分的知識或經驗。
definition.en_def: A preconceived opinion or judgment about a person or group, often based on insufficient knowledge or experience.
definition.example: Her prejudice against the new student was evident in her dismissive attitude.
